remarks: Cancellation law for division and multiplication.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
statement:
dmmcand.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. CC ) $.
dmmcand.b $e |- ( ph -> B e. CC ) $.
dmmcand.c $e |- ( ph -> C e. CC ) $.
dmmcand.bn0 $e |- ( ph -> B =/= 0 ) $.
dmmcand $p |- ( ph -> ( ( A / B ) x. ( B x. C ) ) = ( A x. C ) ) $.
